text: This Chinese passage is talking about a birthday (生日).今天是我的生日，早上，妈妈给我煮了一碗面条，因为在中国北方，生日的时候吃的面条，有身体健康的意思。回家以后，爸爸妈妈还送了生日礼物给我，是蓝色的手表，我好开心！Today is my birthday. In the morning, my mother cooked a bowl of noodles because in the north of China we eat healthy noodles for our birthdays.In the evening, I ate cake with my family and friends.After returning home, Mom and Dad also gave me a birthday present; it was a blue watch. I am very happy!
